name: Pop it - Colors
description:
Remastered and Colorful version of Pop it.

Pop the Dots that appear on the screen to score points. Don't miss a dot.

4 Game Modes:

  • Easy - Pop one dot at a time
  • Medium - Pop two dots at a time
  • Hard - Pop three dots at a time.
  • Timed - Pop as many dots as you can before the timer runs out.
